item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Bilguun Byambadorj, and I am a data engineer with a strong background in both mathematics and computer science. My journey in the technical field has been diverse and enriching, spanning academia and industry. I graduated in 2011 with a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics and Computer Science. This dual degree laid a solid foundation for my analytical and problem-solving skills, which I further honed during my graduate studies.
